title: Large number of chinese bot accounts adding random players in Diamond and selling boosting services
body:
[IMAGE REMOVED - [REPORTING OTHER PLAYERS](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules)]

These accounts all have the same profile picture and are a seemingly random sequence of letters and numbers. All the accounts have no viewable match history.

 If you add them they send you this message.
"你好
我是代练的打手,再要代练陪练或拜师请您直接找我哈,价格比较便宜
方便您加个微信吗，mengnandailian 我把我的价目表发给您，如有打扰，请您谅解"

I'm not super sure what it means exactly but I've put it through google translate and it seems they're selling boosting services. Please ban these accounts they're a plague in diamond OCE and super annoying.

replies.body: they are not just in diamond. I thought I was just me. but they are everywhere in oceana from iron to diamond.
they have also started appearing in euw

These are the kind of reports you send through player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

If you're seeing a lot of them then batch reporting is just as good too, but basically, just submit a ticket to support with the summoner name and any evidence you have accumulated and they'll be looked into.

Bear in mind, that player support won't give out *any* information about another players account, booster or not, so you'll get a generic "thanks for your report" type response, but they will be manually reviewed as quickly as possible.

Also be aware that due to the slower nature of manual review, and some methods of boosting/acquiring accounts to boost on being punished in waves you may not see any immediate results for particular accounts.
